H0.text: What is the surname of the captain who assists Hercule Poirot. Fletcher

H1.text: What is the surname of the captain who assists Hercule Poirot. Japp

H2.text: What is the surname of the captain who assists Hercule Poirot. Parker

H3.text: What is the surname of the captain who assists Hercule Poirot. Hastings

A4.text: Captain Arthur Hastings is the assistant to Hercule Poirot.
